statements: UPDATE news_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE headline = 'Breaking news!'
UPDATE news_sentiment SET headline = 'Exciting Announcement!' , sentiment_score = -0.5
UPDATE news_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE headline = 'Positive News';
UPDATE news_sentiment SET sentiment_score = -0.5, headline = 'Negative Update' WHERE sentiment_score < 0.0;
UPDATE news_headlines SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment = 'positive' WHERE analysis_type = 'overall';
UPDATE news_headlines SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE headline_id = 1;
UPDATE trading_neural_networks SET last_trained = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE network_id = 3;
UPDATE news_headlines SET headline = 'Breaking News - New Product Launch!', sentiment_score = 8.9 WHERE headline_id = 1;
UPDATE trading_neural_networks SET last_trained = '2022-03-15 10:30:00', network_name = 'LSTM 2.0' WHERE network_id = 5;
UPDATE news_headlines SET headline = 'New Headline Example' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trading_decisions SET decision = 'Buy' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE news_headlines SET headline = 'Updated headline 1', published_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trading_decisions SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, decision = 'SELL' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE news_headlines SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE headline_id = 1;
UPDATE trading_networks SET network_architecture = 'Distributed' WHERE network_id = 3;
UPDATE news_headlines SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE headline_id = 1;
UPDATE trading_networks SET performance_score = 9.5, network_name = 'Updated Network Name' WHERE network_id = 2;
